action.text: SA 3024 fell when SA 3023 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 3024 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3023 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3024 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3023 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
